metadata.title: Size Distribution of Phytoplankton in the Western Pacific Ocean and Adjacent Waters in Summer

creators.name: Ken Furuya of University of Tokyo, Dept. Aquatic Bioscience

metadata.description: Size distribution of phytoplankton in terms of cell number and carbon content were examined in summer.  Carbon content was determined by conversion from cell volume that was estimated by image analysis of microscopic images of cells.
metadata.notes:
Purpose: Comparison of phytoplankton cell size structure among different areas of the Pacific and adjacent waters.

Status: Complete

Maintenance frequency: Irregular

Access constraints: None

Use constraints: None
